description: This file is a C++ header defining the Badger class within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace. It declares the class that implements plugin and app gateway request handler interfaces, along with numerous methods for device and application management, permissions, and other functionalities. It includes class members, method declarations, interface mappings, and necessary includes.

classes.name: Badger
classes.description: Represents the Badger plugin class implementing the plugin interface and app gateway request handler, managing device and app interactions within the WPEFramework.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the plugin with the given shell context.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Deinitializes the plugin for cleanup.

methods.name: Information
methods.description: Returns information about the plugin.

methods.name: HandleAppGatewayRequest
methods.description: Processes app gateway requests with context, method, payload, and produces a result.

methods.name: DeviceInfo
methods.description: Retrieves device information for a given app ID.

methods.name: DeviceCapabilities
methods.description: Retrieves device capabilities for a given app ID.

methods.name: NetworkConnectivity
methods.description: Retrieves network connectivity status for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetDeviceId
methods.description: Retrieves the device ID for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetDeviceName
methods.description: Retrieves the device name for a given app ID.

methods.name: ValidateCachedPermission
methods.description: Validates cached permissions for the specified app ID.

methods.name: GetTimeZone
methods.description: Retrieves the timezone information for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetHDCPStatus
methods.description: Retrieves HDCP status for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetHDRStatus
methods.description: Retrieves HDR status.

methods.name: GetDeviceType
methods.description: Retrieves device type for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetAudioModeStatus
methods.description: Retrieves audio mode status for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetWebBrowserStatus
methods.description: Retrieves web browser status for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetWiFiStatus
methods.description: Retrieves WiFi status for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetNativeDimensions
methods.description: Gets native display dimensions for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetVideoDimensions
methods.description: Gets video display dimensions for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetDeviceModel
methods.description: Retrieves device model information for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetDeviceUid
methods.description: Retrieves device UID for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetAccountUid
methods.description: Retrieves account UID for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetLocalizationPostalCode
methods.description: Retrieves postal code related to localization for a given app ID.

methods.name: ShowToaster
methods.description: Displays a toaster message for a given app ID.

methods.name: GetPayload
methods.description: Retrieves payload data for a given app ID.

methods.name: OnLaunch
methods.description: Handles launch action for a given app ID.

methods.name: NavigateToCompanyPage
methods.description: Navigates to a company page for a given app ID.

methods.name: PromptEmail
methods.description: Prompts for email input for a given app ID.

methods.name: ShowPinOverlay
methods.description: Displays PIN overlay for a given app ID.

methods.name: Settings
methods.description: Accesses settings for a given app ID.

methods.name: SubscribeToSettings
methods.description: Subscribes to settings updates for a given app ID.

methods.name: EntitlementsAccountLink
methods.description: Links entitlements account for a given app ID.

methods.name: MediaEventAccountLink
methods.description: Links media event account for a given app ID.

methods.name: LaunchpadAccountLink
methods.description: Links launchpad account for a given app ID.

methods.name: CompareAppSettings
methods.description: Compares application settings for a given app ID.

methods.name: XIFA
methods.description: Performs XIFA operation (specific purpose not detailed).

methods.name: AppStoreId
methods.description: Retrieves app store identifier for a given app ID.

methods.name: LimitAdTracking
methods.description: Limits ad tracking for a given app ID.

methods.name: DeviceAdAttributes
methods.description: Retrieves device advertising attributes.

methods.name: InitObject
methods.description: Initializes an object for a given app ID.

methods.name: AppAuth
methods.description: Performs app authentication.

methods.name: OAuthBearerToken
methods.description: Retrieves OAuth bearer token.

methods.name: XSCD
methods.description: Performs XSCD operation.

methods.name: RefreshPlatformAuthToken
methods.description: Refreshes platform authentication token.

methods.name: GetOat
methods.description: Retrieves OAT data.

methods.name: GetXact
methods.description: Retrieves XACT data.

methods.name: Deeplink
methods.description: Handles deeplink processing.

methods.name: NavigateToEntityPage
methods.description: Navigates to an entity page.

methods.name: NavigateToFullScreenVideo
methods.description: Navigates to a full-screen video.

methods.name: ResizeVideo
methods.description: Resizes video content.

methods.name: LogMoneyBadgerLoaded
methods.description: Logs when Money Badger is loaded.

methods.name: GetSystemInfo
methods.description: Retrieves system information.

methods.name: Shutdown
methods.description: Shuts down the application or service.

methods.name: DismissLoadingScreen
methods.description: Dismisses the loading screen.

methods.name: HandleMetricsProcessing
methods.description: Processes metrics payloads for a given app.
